action.primary: Nourishes Yin, subdues Yang and nourishes the Liver and Kidneys

indications: Seminal emission, low libido, low back and knee weakness and soreness, cough

action.primary: Stops bleeding, dissipates Blood Stasis and resolves swelling

indications: Hemoptysis, traumatic hemorrhage, hematemesis, hemorrhoids, metrorrhagia

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with a poor appetite and excessive Phlegm.
